means: 遭受，招致，引起( incur的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Many of the world's farmers are also incurring economic deficits.
sentence.Network_cn: 世界上许多农民还在遭受经济上的亏损.

sentence.Network_en: He spoke to the Don directly, taking a chance on incurring Michael's ill will.
sentence.Network_cn: 他直接向老头子谈自己的意见, 这显然要冒引起迈克尔反感的风险.

sentence.Network_en: Foul Stroke - a shot or action that infringes the rules, incurring a penalty.
sentence.Network_cn: 犯规击球 – 将会受到惩罚的违规击球或行为.

list.abs: 商务口译词汇_中国同传口译网 ... 美元国家 dollar countries 蒙受损失 incur losses 密电 code telegram.
分类词汇表_百度文库 ... 疲劳 fatigue 绝症 incurable disease 垃圾食品 junk food.
香港新闻从业者用语 ... 小脑失调症 cerebellar ataxia 不治之症 incurable disease 不要放弃病人 not to give up on patients.
会计英语-财务财经词条 ... 1996 incremental ysis 增量分析法 1997 incurred cost 已发生成本 1998 indebtedness 欠债.
SAP字典 - MBA智库文档 ... incremental order quantity 定货量增量 incurred costs 应计的成本 indent 双联定单，缩排.

entry.def: If you incur something unpleasant, it happens to you because of something you have done.

example.ex: The government had also incurred huge debts...
She falls in love and incurs the wrath of her father.
example.tran: 她恋爱了,这引起了父亲的愤怒。

means.word_mean: 1. acquiring or coming into something (usually undesirable);

sentences.sentence: "incurring debts is easier than paying them"

auth_sentence.content: At prevailing prices the mines are incurring substantial losses.
auth_sentence.res_content: At prevailing prices the mines are incurring substantial losses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At prevailing prices the mines are incurring substantial losses.

auth_sentence.content: The airline has been incurring heavy losses in recent years.
auth_sentence.res_content: The airline has been incurring heavy losses in recent years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The airline has been incurring heavy losses in recent years.

auth_sentence.content: The project could risk incurring international sanctions surrounding Tehran's nuclear program.
auth_sentence.res_content: The project could risk incurring international sanctions surrounding Tehran's nuclear program.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The project could risk incurring international sanctions surrounding Tehran's nuclear program.
